item.title: ONAP Beijing Release Developer Forum: MSB to Support Carrier Grade ONAP Microservice Architecture with Service Mesh
item.description: Introduction In this session, I’ll talk about the MSB Plan for R2 and Beyond. item.title: ONAP Developer Event: Microservice Bus Tutorial
item.description: Introduction Microservices Bus(MSB) provide a reliable, resilient and scalable communication and governance infrastructure to support Microservice Architecture including including service registration/discovery, external API gateway, internal API gateway, client SDK.
